References i().

{VERBOSE_REPORT;
  dgematrix_small<n,n> X;
  for(long i=0; i<n; i++){
    for(long j=0; j<i; j++){
      X(i,j) =A(i,j)+B(i,j);
    }
    for(long j=i; j<n; j++){
      X(i,j) =A(i,j)+B(j,i);
    }
  }
  return X;
}

Definition at line 336 of file dgematrix_small-functions.hpp.

References i().

{VERBOSE_REPORT;
  dgematrix_small<n,n> X;
  for(long i=0; i<n; i++){
    for(long j=0;   j<=i; j++){ X(i,j)=A(i,j)-B(i,j); }
    for(long j=i+1; j<n;  j++){ X(i,j)=A(i,j)-B(j,i); }
  }
  return X;
}
